title: Create ralph config interactive flow
description: Implement `ralph config` command with gum-based interactive prompts for model strategy, notifications, and defaults.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Use gum choose for model strategy: smart vs single
Use gum choose for default model: opus/sonnet/haiku
Use gum confirm for notifications enabled
Use gum input for ntfy topic if notifications enabled
Fall back to simple read prompts if gum not installed
